name: Corrupted Kingdom
description:
Corrupted Kingdom is a story driven rougelite, in which you explore dungeons to gather resources, to upgrade your village and equipment.

- Story -

"A long time ago there once lived a King who ruled over all of Statera.
He was loved by the Citizens and respected by the rich.
But one fateful day changed everything.
Corruption has swept through the country.
All who are corrupted have lost their minds and infected others or killed them.
The King tried to save his people, he did his best, but he failed.
He corrupted himself.

However, not all hope was lost."

- Gameplay -

Explore the random generated Dungeons and gather as much resources as you can. But you are not alone, protected yourself from the creatures living in the area. Use the resources to upgrade your village or craft them into a powerful weapon.

- Features -

  • Over 20 unique craftable Items.
  • Every Weapon has a unique attack. 
  • 3 Tech Trees.
  • 8 Unique Enemies.
  • 5 Upgradeable Buildings.
  • 2 Bosses
  • 1 Easter Egg

2 - 6 hours of gameplay.
